articles.author: Bridget Reilly
articles.title: Dave McCarty, 2004 Red Sox World Series champion, dead at 54
articles.description: Dave McCarty was first drafted by the Twins in the first round of the 1991 MLB June Amateur Draft out of Stanford to start his 11-year career.
articles.content:
